meanings.definition: A person who is knowledgeable or experienced in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The wiseguys at the library helped me find the right book.
meanings.sent2: The wiseguys in the workshop knew exactly how to fix the machine.
meanings.sent3: The wiseguys at the science fair impressed everyone with their experiments.
meanings.sent4: She was a wiseguy in gardening, making her plants bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The wiseguys in the cooking class shared their secret recipes with me.

meanings.definition: A person who is clever or cunning in a humorous or sarcastic way.
meanings.sent1: The wiseguys in the comedy club always had the audience laughing.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the wiseguy of the office for his witty remarks.
meanings.sent3: The wiseguys at the party kept everyone entertained with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: She outsmarted him with her wiseguy remarks during the debate.
meanings.sent5: The wiseguys in the movie made the audience chuckle with their antics.
